title: Pentakill Kayle looks... Bad.
body: Her hair especially. She was really cool and hot before! But now she just looks trashy. Luckily her Inquisitor skin looks really good so I'll have to drop some money on that. But I'm disappointed, it was my favourite skin and they ruined it :(

replies.body: wdym it's perfect. in the beginning the black hair is weird indeed but her last form is just breathtakingly beautiful!

> [{quoted}](name=Annikins,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ewO3zg7Z,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-02-21T14:20:55.057+0000)
>
> wdym it's perfect. in the beginning the black hair is weird indeed but her last form is just breathtakingly beautiful!

Yeah, it looks to me like she starts as a groupie, and then eventually becomes a full fledged member of the band at 16. My only complaint is that the transformation looks weird. There's not clouding, smoke, fire, nothing to transition her, she just instantly snaps from black hair and tee to blonde with coat.
The entire Kayle rework's appearance is a major disappointment. How this idea got approved is simply unknowable. It looks like complete garbage.
